page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are relatively few jobs within the area. Most of these are in {services}including the shops, banks, offices, garages, public houses, hospitals, schools, golf-courses and the sewage works. The only primary occupation is{farming.}The vast majority of this relatively affluent community{commute}out of the zone for employment. A survey showed the number of households with at least one out-commuter varied from 48% on the council estates (610930) to over 75% In the 'STOCKBROKER BELT' (615945). Most commute to London but other jobs are found in Brentwood town (offices), Basildon, Chelmsford, Romford, Ilford and Southend. This is relatively little unemployment in this area compared with the rest of Essex. A{YTS operates in a redundant school for 16 year old school leavers without a job.
